channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Tencent AI Lab on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Can We Leave Deepfake Data Behind in Training Deepfake Detector?
item.description: ProDet: Deepfake detection enhanced by progressively organizing blendfake and deepfake data in the latent space, improving generalization and robustness.

item.title: IDGen: Item Discrimination Induced Prompt Generation for LLM Evaluation
item.description: IDGen synthesizes LLM evaluation prompts using Item Discrimination theory, creating a more challenging and discriminative dataset than previous methods.

item.title: RG-SAN: Rule-Guided Spatial Awareness Network for End-to-End 3D Referring Expression Segmentation
item.description: RG-SAN achieves state-of-the-art 3D referring expression segmentation by leveraging spatial awareness and rule-guided weak supervision, significantly improving accuracy and handling of ambiguous descr…

item.title: Self-playing Adversarial Language Game Enhances LLM Reasoning
item.description: Self-play adversarial language game boosts LLM reasoning!

item.title: Toward Self-Improvement of LLMs via Imagination, Searching, and Criticizing
item.description: ALPHALLM boosts LLM performance in complex reasoning tasks by using imagination, search, and criticism to create a self-improving loop, eliminating the need for extra training data.
